name: Vortex (itch) (castingflame)
description:
Beta version: 0.2

Fixed spelling mistakes.

Added background music.

Added discovery and life counters.

Beta version: 0.1

My very first little taste of Unity is this text adventure. There are a few spelling mistakes that I will sort out but its fully functional. There are 40+ decisions to be made and more than one way to die, restart and win the game. Enjoy!
